subject: Leadership
title: Repairing Broken Trust
description: A 60-second lesson on Repairing Broken Trust.

hook.text: After a badly handled layoff, a team's trust in leadership collapses. Morale drops. Resignations spike.

buildup.text: Broken trust follows a pattern: shock, anger, withdrawal. Leaders must address each phase, not rush past it.

discovery.text: Trust repair takes three steps: acknowledge the breach, take responsibility, and show changed behavior over time.

twist.text: Apologies without behavior change make things worse. People watch actions after the apology more than before.

climax.text: Repaired trust can become stronger than original trust. Teams that rebuild after betrayal develop deeper bonds.
